Question.Subject: Wellington sign poll. Where do we vote? If anyone else has voted?
Question.Content: Where do we vote? Obviously because i want to vote. And if anyone else has voted, what did you guys vote for?

ChosenAnswer:
It closed on Sunday...
You voted on the Dominion Posts website.
The top two are going 'head to head' in a final vote on that opens on Wednesday on - http://www.stuff.co.nz/dominion-post/

Answers.Answer: They should have one for the All Blacks winning. Wellywood looks rather cheap and tacky
